repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies Files
did.abstract: Files of the ILR School's Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains correspondence, memoranda, notes, and reports relating to the work of the ILR School's Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies, 1956-1962.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Faculty Committee on Personnel Policies Files #/3092. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
